field.label: Enable local logging
field.help: Enable writing log files to the local disk.

field.label: Maximum preserved files
field.help: Number of logs to preserve. When no maximum file size is offered or the logs are smaller than the the size requested, this equals the number of days.

field.label: Maximum file size (MB)
field.help: Maximum file size per log file. When set and a log file exceeds the amount specified, it will be rotated.
